description: You are in charge of allocating cargo space on a ship. You have a certain amount of valuable cargo to ship. You can allocate some/all of your cargo to a partner company that owns a faster vessel. For every unit of cargo sent, the partner promises to return double the shipment profit upon successful delivery. The partner then decides how much profit to share.

behavior_choices.trust_none: allocate 0 units of cargo to partner
behavior_choices.trust_low: allocate half of the cargo to partner
